You can manually create a CommodityChannelIndex indicator, so it doesnâ€™t automatically update. Manual indicators let you update their values with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the CommodityChannelIndex constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the CommodityChannelIndex class.

Parameters
